item.title: Core Data Explained
item.description: Core data is one of the most misunderstood frameworks in iOS. If one understands the individual components of the framework and its usage, it is one of the easy to use frameworks. Lets go through the individual components to get an overview of this framework and see its usage through swift code snippets and throw away the frustration. Core data framework is a model layer and persistent technology. It helps you build the model layer that represents the state of your application and perform store and retrieve operations of data through objects persistently.
